channel.title: CVE Feed for CKSource -- all

item.title: CVE-2011-4972|2024-08-07T00:23:39.372Z -- cksource -- ckeditor%20drupal%20module
item.description: hook_file_download in the CKEditor module 7.x-1.4 for Drupal does not properly restrict access to private files, which allows remote attackers to read private files via a direct request.
